hero.bio: Frontend developer building high-performance web apps with Next.js and mobile apps with React Native.

projects.sectionIntro: A few projects that reflect how I work: product focus, robust design systems, and carefully crafted front-end execution.

jikowood.summary: Full-stack showcase website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB to present custom woodworking projects and collect client testimonials. The website contributed to a 17% increase in business activity over one year.

purposeSport.summary: Full-stack showcase website built with Next.js, TypeScript, for a basketball recruiting agency, featuring a dynamic and interactive image and video gallery. The platform contributed to a 3% growth in business activity over one year.
purposeSport.role: Product architecture, UX and front-end integration

maxwellJones.summary: Full-stack corporate website built with Next.js and TypeScript for a holding company, featuring multilingual support (FR/EN), interactive philosophy sections, and a dynamic strategic network panel. The platform provides a modern single-page experience designed to present the company’s “Learn, Earn, Return” ecosystem.
maxwellJones.role: Product strategy, UX/UI direction and front-end delivery
